sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz';
import Card from '../card.js';
import FlexContainer from '../flex-container';
import FlexItem from '../flex-item';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"flex-item"}}>{`Flex Item`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Flex Item give you options to control the flex properties of the elements inside a FlexContainer:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"order"}}>{`Order`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This props set the order of the element`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer inline={true} style={{border: 'solid black thin'}}>
  <FlexItem style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Flex Item 1
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Flex Item 2
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Flex Item 3
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Flex Item 4
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}} order="-1">
    Flex Item 5 but order="-1"
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"grow"}}>{`Grow`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This props defines `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`flex-grow`}</MDXTag>{` property`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer width="100%" style={{border: 'solid black thin'}}>
  <FlexItem style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}} grow="1">
    Flex Item 1 has grow="1"
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Flex Item 2
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basis"}}>{`Basis`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This props defines `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`flex-basis`}</MDXTag>{` property`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer width="100%" style={{border: 'solid black thin'}}>
  <FlexItem basis="20%" grow="1">
    Flex Item 1 has basis="20%"
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem basis="50%" style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Flex Item 2 has basis="50%"
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"align"}}>{`Align`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This props defines `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`align-self`}</MDXTag>{` property`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer width="100%" style={{border: 'solid black thin'}}>
  <FlexItem align="flex-end" style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Flex Item 1 has align="flex-end"
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem  style={{border: 'solid blue thin'}}>
    Flex Item 2
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
